title: How to craft your own Hextech Box (printable)

embed.description: those are the links: A4: https://www.facebook.com/estudios.ona/photos/a.1815449175403509.1073741828.1815405362074557/1824195917862168/?type=3&theater A3: ...

body:
I've prepared a hextech box to cut and craft. 
I did this with photoshop cos I wanted to create a box where i could place a necklace that i bought to my girlfriend, so I could give it to her as a present box. I also did a printable key that could be made from three key fragments.
When she won an S+, i gave her the box, but i didn't let her open it, i told her that i've hidden three fragment keys in the room, and that she would only be able to open it if he found them.
There are three sizes to print, each one needs its own size paper.
A4 size:
https://www.facebook.com/estudios.ona/photos/a.1815449175403509.1073741828.1815405362074557/1824195917862168/?type=3&theater 

A3 size:
https://www.facebook.com/estudios.ona/photos/a.1815449175403509.1073741828.1815405362074557/1824196224528804/?type=3&theater

A2 size:
https://www.facebook.com/estudios.ona/photos/a.1815449175403509.1073741828.1815405362074557/1824196374528789/?type=3&theater

What do u guys think about it?

I'll keep uploading my works, cya {{champion:18}} 
https://www.instagram.com/estudios.ona/

replies.body: That's a cool idea! I will definitely try it out when my printer can print colours again :)
Thanks to you! I think you'll be the first hahahah! hope you tell me something when its done
